trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dublin
There was one other sighting in Dublin on or around December 13th 2012
divs: Sighting Details at 8:15 est i was driving west on i 16 with passengers and observed a saucer like craft approaching at tree top height on the right shoulder . the object then hovered over my truck at tree top height for a couple of seconds and then continued to travel east above the west bound lane at approx 30 mph. it had 8 white lights around the underside perimeter and one light of equal size in the center. the lights did not appear to illuminate the ground only the object itself
Summary: i was traveling w passenger on i 16 east saucer like object approached from tree top on shoulder and hovered over my vehicle for a couple of seconds theh teaveled east bound over the west bound lane
